sentences.en: An international syndicate will be responsible for building the dam.
sentences.cn: 该大坝将由某国际财团负责建造.

sentences.en: Began to issue bonds by Syndicate underwriting in 1991.
sentences.cn: 1991年开始采用承购包销方式发行国债.

sentences.en: Hey, maybe we should start up our own syndicate!
sentences.cn: 嗨, 也许我们也该成立我们自己的彩票团队!

sentences.en: If you can discuss this matter with Chinese Syndicate of electrical industry.
sentences.cn: 如果你能和电力行业的中国财团讨论这个事情.

sentences.en: My company is a front for an international crime syndicate.
sentences.cn: 我的公司是国际犯罪集团的掩护者.

sentences.en: Our companies formed a syndicate to bid for the big new contract.
sentences.cn: 我们各家公司组成了财团,以便竞投该新的大合约.

sentences.en: Ryan: This syndicate thing sounds like a good idea to me.
sentences.cn: 瑞恩: 合买彩票是个不错的主意.

sentences.en: Ryan: Woah, woah , woah . Hold up a second . What's a syndicate, again?
sentences.cn: 瑞恩: 天呐天呐天呐. 不过等等,什么叫彩票团队?

sentences.en: Susan: How did they all win the money ? Were they part of a syndicate or something?
sentences.cn: 苏珊: 他们怎么中的奖 啊 ?是合买的彩票 吗 ?

sentences.en: The bureau is investigating if the syndicate was linked with previous cases.
sentences.cn: 有关当局正在调查是次事件和之前数宗偷渡案是否有关.

sentences.en: The crime syndicate has the goods on the governor and is blackmailing him.
sentences.cn: 那个罪魁集团掌握了州长的确凿罪证并且正在敲诈他.

sentences.en: The discount given by the syndicate to members of the selling group.
sentences.cn: 辛迪加向出售团成员提供的折扣.

sentences.en: The larger meeting area is useful for bringing together syndicate groups.
sentences.cn: 更大的那个会议区很有用,可以把辛迪加集团聚集在一起.

sentences.en: They formed a syndicate to buy the car in which they competed in the race.
sentences.cn: 他们合伙买下了他们参加赛车时用的那部车。

sentences.en: We are insured with a syndicate of underwriters.
sentences.cn: 我们向一家联合企业保的险.

words.tran_cn: 企业联合组织；辛迪加组织
辛迪加组织者；参加辛迪加者

trans.tran_cn: 辛迪加，企业联合组织，财团
trans.tran_en: a group of people or companies who join together in order to achieve a particular aim

trans.tran_cn: 把（文章、图片、电视节目等）出售给多个媒体
